Package projectone.demo.controller

Class kitchenController

java.lang.Object
projectone.demo.controller.kitchenController
@RequestMapping("/kitchen") @Controller public class kitchenController extends Object
Controller for kitchen operations related to order management.

    • kitchenController

      kitchenController(OrdersRepository repository, OrderProductsRepo orderprodRepository, ProductsRepository productRepo)
      Constructs a KitchenController with necessary repositories.
      Parameters:
      repository - Repository for orders.
      orderprodRepository - Repository for order products.
      productRepo - Repository for products.

  • Method Details

    • Orders

      @GetMapping String Orders(org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.ui.Model junction, org.springframework.ui.Model product)
      Displays the kitchen dashboard with orders, their details, and products.
      Parameters:
      model - Model to pass orders to the view.
      junction - Model to pass order products (junction data).
      product - Model to pass products data.
      Returns:
      The kitchen view name.

    • update

      @PostMapping String update(@RequestParam("id") String id, @RequestParam("update") String update, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates the status of an order based on kitchen actions.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the order to update.
      update - New status for the order.
      model - Model to pass updated order data.
      Returns:
      Redirects back to the kitchen dashboard.
